about_the_game:
Playing as Oleg or Olga, you will go on an exciting journey into a 3x9 Kingdom to help the kids return home.

During the story, you will meet many characters of Russian folklore, such as The Gorynych Snake, Baba Yaga, The Mermaid, Chernomor, and many others. Some creatures will need your help, while others will try their best to keep the kids in the 3x9 Kingdom.

In the game, you will find:
  • 14 mini-games. After completing a mini-game during the storyline, you can play it again and compete for the record!
  • About 3 hours of the story;
  • Funny characters and exciting dialogues;
  • Many locations and unique soundtrack;
  • Psychologists and teachers participated in the game's development.

Baba Yaga opened the magic gate, but it closed after you accidentally passed through. How quickly will the guys be able to return home?

name: 3х9 Царство: Дорога приключений

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000, GeForce GT 330M, Radeon HD 4670 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000, GeForce GT 330M, Radeon HD 4670 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A good story about a brother and a sister looking for a way home through the 3х9 Kingdom. A fun storyline, instructive stories from characters, interesting logical puzzles, exciting mini-games, and more. Immerse yourself in the world of the old fairy tale in a new way!
supported_languages:
Russian*, English
*languages with full audio support
